Reviews.Title: I am very happy with my GE A1251 digital camera shown on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Anne Sawyer
Reviews.Content: My GE A1251 digital camera was dropped and broken so I ordered another one and was sent  a GE 1255  that had a battery pack.  I sent that one back since I wanted a camera that I could use batteries.  Meanwhile, I looked on Amazon and saw a supposedly used GE A1251 in good condition for only $15 with about $10 for shipping.  So, I ordered and received the camera in a couple of days.  It looked like new and works great just like my former camera that I liked so much.  However, my first camera order did come after a week and I was sent a silver GE A 1250 that cost much more but will be adequate for a second backup camera.  I appreciate so much the fast and efficient service from Amazon and plan to check before ordering any other items.

ProductInfo.Features:
The GE A1251 digital camera is easy to use, yet rich with features.
Its offers a great combination of 12.2-megapixel resolution, 5X optical zoom and 2.5-inch ultra-clear LCD screen.
Featuring Face and Smile/Blink Detection, the GE A950 takes your picture taking experience to a whole new level.
12.2MP imager delivers the quality you need for great photos on-screen as well as detailed prints
In-Camera Red-Eye Removal removes red-eye immediately while viewing images on the LCD screen
ProductInfo.Name: GE A1251 12.2 Megapixel Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom 2.5" LCD
